function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Environmental factors increasing the risk of respiratory diseases","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements with inadequate infrastructure and services","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of secure tenure for residents","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited infrastructure in informal urban settlements","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal urban settlements with limited access to healthcare may experience a rapid spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of official recognition and support for informal settlements may result in limited access to healthcare resources and public health interventions.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services such as water and space","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate screening and testing strategies in some countries may result in underreporting of covid-19 cases and transmission rates.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater treatment plant wwtp inflow","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional activated-sludge wwtp","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large emission of sars-cov-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants wwtps .","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection limit of the method not optimized for lower incidence levels","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimization of pcr conditions may result in false-positive results.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of extraneous nucleic acids during the concentration process of wastewater samples.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Untested retention of wastewater samples before the sars-cov-2 pandemic as control.","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possible cross contamination during the purification or rna isolation step","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pcr targeting sars-cov-2 rdrp and m-gene in wastewater analysis.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral outgrowth assay using caco-2 cells for detecting sars-cov-2 infection in wastewater samples.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of rt-qpcr primer and probe efficiency for detecting sars-cov-2 genes in wastewater.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing sample materials during a pandemic carries the risk of incomplete or inaccurate detection of contagious viruses such as sars-cov-2.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on pcr assays targeting specific genes for sars-cov-2 detection in wastewater may result in limited virus detection and surveillance.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher gene equivalent concentrations in the effluent than the influent due to repartitioning of gene material during wastewater treatment.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral rna is not eliminated in the treated wastewater, indicating potential presence of contagious viruses.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to detect infectious sars-cov-2 particles in the treated sewage despite the presence of viral rna fragments.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive identification of human sars-cov-2 by means of rt-qpcr","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher sars-cov-2 rna copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2-specific rna in untreated and treated wastewater samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of filtration equipment may not effectively remove all contaminants, including contagious disease particles.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of endogenous parameters like creatinine and urea could lead to incorrect assessments of water quality and potential health risks.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to wastewater samples during analysis","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mass spectrometric equipment and analysis","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Isolation and use of hcov-229e in pcr","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sanger sequencing analysis","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Replication studies with sars-cov-2 positive wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of specific pcr conditions for detecting viruses","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of viral rna samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Verification of specificity and sensitivity of rna sequencing","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral rna.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in testing procedures and analysis methods for detecting coronavirus genetic material in environmental samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the distribution and survival of sars-cov-2 in the aquatic environment","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 via feces in wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"}]}
